name: Chocolate Sheet Pan Pancakes
description: These are ideal for a hands-off brunch where everyone gets a pancake hot off the pan without flipping a single cake! Prep ahead and bake cakes, then cool, portion, and wrap individually. Freeze up to three months; pop frozen into a toaster oven to reheat.
preparation: Line 1⁄4 Sheet Pan with 1⁄4 Sheet Pan Liner.
In a large bowl, whisk mix, cocoa powder, egg, milk, oil, and vanilla extract.  Let batter rest 5 min; it will continue to thicken.
Scrape batter into pan. Spread evenly to fill corners. Gently tap the pan on the kitchen counter a few times to help even out the batter and release air bubbles.
Bake until centre springs back when pressed with a finger and a toothpick inserted in the centre comes out clean, 12 min. Let cool in pan 10 min.
Using a Flipper, cut into squares and serve!
tips: Add sliced bananas, blueberries, or chocolate chips to the batter before baking.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 cup fruit such as berries and 1⁄2 cup 2% plain Greek yogurt.

products.name: Pancake & Waffle Mix (Pack of 3)
summary: Stack ‘em up: It’s time to make the fluffiest pancakes and waffles ever! Add a few simple ingredients to this gluten free mix and griddle, flip, or press your way through an easy and delicious breakfast.

products.name: 1/4 Sheet Pan Liner (Set of 2)
summary: Easy to clean, nonstick, silicone mat with raised edges.

products.name: 1/4 Sheet Pan (Set of 2)
summary: Smaller size than a standard sheet pan for easy handling.

products.name: Flipper
summary: Flip it good! Level up your cooking skills in an instant with this durable flipper. Easily lift, move, and serve everything from eggs and pancakes to desserts and beyond.
